title: Holt Barkl and Landers on resistance - causation

content.question: Which of the following best explains how the Stono Rebellion affected Fort Mose?

choices.label: The Spanish lost control of their last colony in the Americas.
The Spanish captured the residents of Fort Mose and exiled them to Africa.
The British government invaded Florida and destroyed Fort Mose.
The British abolished slavery throughout their empire to prevent similar uprisings.

content.answer: The British government invaded Florida and destroyed Fort Mose.

topic.text: 2.11: The Stono Rebellion and Fort Mose

skill.text: 1.C: Identify and explain patterns, connections, or other relationships (causation, changes, continuities, comparison).
